name: 2022 International Conference on Biotechnology and Bioengineering (12th ICBB)
content:
Dear Friends and Colleagues, On behalf of the Organizing Committee, it is our great pleasure to welcome you to participate in the [**2022 International Conference on Biotechnology and Bioengineering**](https://www.icbb.apaset.edu.pl/) (12th ICBB, 2022) to be held **virtually online** during Sept. 27-30, 2022. 
 
_**\[Organizers\]**_ 
 
 ICBB2022 is co-organized by Asia-Pacific Association of Science Engineering and Technology, Institute of Biomolecular Chemistry-National Research Council of Italy, Institute of Bioorganic Chemistry-Polish Academy of Sciences, and Chinese Journal of Biologicals, in collaboration with multiple academic affiliations. 
 
**_\[Aims and Topics\]_** 
 
 ICBB2022 aims to provide an innovative and comprehensive overview of **BIOTECHNOLOGY** and **BIOENGINEERING**, a focus will be given to major research advances including: 1\. Microbiology, virology, cytology and immunology; 2\. Biological macromolecules, proteins and nucleic acids; 3\. Biomaterials, biopolymers and bioenergy; 4\. Biomedicine, biopharmaceuticals, pharmacology and toxicology; 5\. Agricultural & food science and industrial biotechnology; 6\. Applications in bioengineering, biomedical engineering & technology and other related fields. For more details please visit [Conference Themes](https://www.icbb.apaset.edu.pl/about/#topics). 
 
_**\[Publications\]**_ 
 All accepted abstracts will be included in conference abstract book ([details](https://www.icbb.apaset.edu.pl/cfp/)). After author's extension and peer-review by the committee, selected full papers wil be published in conference proceedings and sent for major scientific databases for indexration. 
 \- Previous selected abstracts at ICBB2020, 2019, 2018, 2017 had been published in _Basic & Clinical Pharmacology & Toxicology_ (indexed in SCI - Web of Science, Impact factor: 4.080). 
 \- Accepted full papers ICBB2020, 2019, 2018, 2017 had been published in _AIP Conference Proceedings_ (indexed in CPCI â€“ Web of Science & Scopus). 
 \- Selected full papers had been published at special issue in _Biomolecules_ (indexed in SCI - Web of Science, Impact factor: 4.082) in 2019, and _Molecules_ (indexed in SCI - Web of Science, Impact factor: 3.267) in 2018 & 2017. 
 
 We look forward to having you join us for this fully online event (>>[Register here](https://www.icbb.apaset.edu.pl/registration/)), for more details please visit at [ICBB2022 registration page](https://www.icbb.apaset.edu.pl/registration/). 
 
 Please also bring this notice to the attention of any of your colleagues who may be interested in participating in the conference (**[Download ICBB2022 flyer](https://www.icbb.apaset.edu.pl/flyer)**), also you can [**subscribe to ICBB2022 mail list**](https://www.icbb.apaset.edu.pl/about/subscribe.html) to be informed, thank you very much. 
 
 With best regards, 
 
 ICBB2022 Organizing Committee
